properties.name: Mount Fuji
properties.description: Japan's sacred 3,776m volcanic cone, iconic symbol visible from Tokyo on clear days (UNESCO)

properties.name: Fushimi Inari Shrine
properties.description: 10,000+ vermillion torii gates winding up a mountain in Kyoto's most iconic shrine

properties.name: Kinkaku-ji (Golden Pavilion)
properties.description: Stunning gold-leaf covered Zen temple reflected in its mirror pond (UNESCO)

properties.name: Arashiyama Bamboo Grove
properties.description: Towering bamboo forest creating an ethereal green corridor in western Kyoto

properties.name: Chureito Pagoda
properties.description: Five-story pagoda with postcard-perfect Mount Fuji views, stunning during cherry blossom season

properties.name: Senso-ji Temple
properties.description: Tokyo's oldest temple with iconic Thunder Gate (Kaminarimon) and Nakamise shopping street

properties.name: Shibuya Crossing
properties.description: World's busiest pedestrian crossing, icon of Tokyo's electric energy

properties.name: Miyajima (Itsukushima Shrine)
properties.description: Floating vermillion torii gate in the sea, one of Japan's most sacred sites (UNESCO)

properties.name: Nara Deer Park
properties.description: 1,000+ sacred deer roaming freely among ancient temples and shrines

properties.name: Tokyo Skytree
properties.description: World's tallest tower at 634m with panoramic views including Mount Fuji
